attachments.title: Project Starline: A high-fidelity telepresence system
attachments.citation: Joseph, Desloge, G., Fortes, T., Gomez, E. M., Häberling, S., Hoppe, H., Andy, Huibers, RICARDOMARTIN-BRUALLA, Andrew, Russell, I., Seitz, S., & Tong, K. K. (2021). Project Starline: A high-fidelity telepresence system. https://www.semanticscholar.org/paper/Project-Starline%3A-A-high-fidelity-telepresence-Joseph-Desloge/34db8aa914149bba1500c57b2f4633e925a6f6c1

prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
引用分组:
请对本文引用部分按照作者的思路进行重新分组, 便于理解和比较不同引用在本文中的作用。

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Project Starline: A high-fidelity telepresence system, was published on 2021. (It can be cite this paper as Joseph et al., 2021 on your answer).
response:
根据提供的文件内容，我们可以将文中的引用按照其在论文中的作用和主题进行重新分组。以下是按照作者的思路进行的分组，使用Markdown格式进行布局：

### 视频会议技术发展
- Sterling, C. H., & Shiers, G. (2000). History of Telecommunications Technology.
- Draper, J. V., Kaber, D. B., & Usher, J. M. (1998). Telepresence.
- Gibbs, S. J., Arapis, C., & Breiteneder, C. J. (1999). TELEPORT – Towards immersive copresence.

### 3D 远程呈现技术
- Baker, H. H., et al. (2002). The Coliseum immersive teleconferencing system.
- Maimone, A., et al. (2012). Enhanced personal autostereoscopic telepresence system using commodity depth cameras.
- Zhang, Z., et al. (2013). Viewport: A distributed, immersive teleconferencing system with infrared dot pattern.

### 3D 音频和空间化音频技术
- Gardner, W. (1997). Head tracked 3-D audio using loudspeakers.
- Lentz, T. (2006). Dynamic crosstalk cancellation for binaural synthesis in virtual reality environments.
- Pulkki, V. (1997). Virtual sound source positioning using vector base amplitude panning.

### 3D 显示和自动立体显示技术
- Dodgson, N. A. (2005). Autostereoscopic 3D displays.
- Borner, R., et al. (2000). A family of single-user autostereoscopic displays with headtracking capabilities.

### 面部追踪和动画技术
- Mingsong, D., et al. (2016). Fusion4D: Real-time performance capture of challenging scenes.
- Lombardi, S., et al. (2018). Deep appearance models for face rendering.
- Wei, S.-E., et al. (2019). VR facial animation via multiview image translation.

### 视频压缩和传输技术
- Johnston, A. B., & Burnett, D. C. (2012). WebRTC: APIs and RTCWEB Protocols of the HTML5 Real-Time Web.
- Vetro, A., et al. (2011). Overview of the stereo and multiview video coding extensions of the H.264/MPEG-4 AVC standard.

### 用户体验和行为研究
- Argyle, M., & Cook, M. (1976). Gaze and mutual gaze.
- Aron, A., et al. (1997). The experimental generation of interpersonal closeness: A procedure and some preliminary findings.
- Hall, J. A., et al. (2019). Nonverbal communication.

### 系统设计与实现
- Chen, Y., et al. (2004). QoS requirements of network applications on the Internet.
- Hesch, J. A., et al. (2008). Mirror-based extrinsic camera calibration.
- Jurk, S., & de la Barré, R. (2014). A new tracking approach for XYZ-user-adaptation of stereoscopic content.

请注意，以上分组是基于文中引用的上下文和主题进行的，可能并不完全涵盖文中所有引用，但提供了一个便于理解和比较不同引用在本文中作用的概览。在实际引用时，请根据具体的出版格式要求进行调整。
